name: Port Noon: Occult Islands of Vespera

cards.rules_text:
Trample
When you cast The Horned-Axe, until your next turn, your life total can't change.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The Lithomachy exposed her to the horrors of extra-planer influence.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature dealt damage by The Crowned Growth this turn dies, its controller gets two poison counters.
When The Crowned Growth leaves the battlefield, up to one target creature you control becomes a copy of The Crowned Growth. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i]

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
You get a Scar. [i](It's a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]A dangerous recipe that unlocks memories from the dead.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{U}{R}, Sacrifice an unblocked attacking creature you control: Put Mother of Ants from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.
At the beginning of each of your postcombat main phases, add {R} for each 2 life your opponents have lost this turn.

Whenever you sacrifice a creature, note its name. 
Once during each of your turns, you may cast a spell from your graveyard with a name noted for cards named The Elegiast.

Trample, haste
Whenever The Forge of Days attacks, you may put a creature card you own in exile onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

Haste
You may choose not to untap The Mirror-Queen during your untap step.
{U}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature, except it has haste. Sacrifice it when The Mirror-Queen becomes untapped.

Lifelink
Other Vampires you control get +2/+0.
Creature tokens you control are Vampires in addition to their other types.
Sacrifice a Vampire: The Red Grail deals 3 damage to any target. Activate only once during each of your turns.

Ward—-Sacrifice a creature.
When The Sun-In-Rags enters, destroy target nonbasic permanent.
Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

Trample, lifelink, ward {1}
Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn and when The Thunderskin dies, induct twice. [i](Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “Sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform this creature.” It transforms into a 4/4 God Horror creature token that can't block.)[/i]

Flash
When The Vagabond enters, draw twice X cards. For each card drawn this way, discard a card unless you sacrifice another permanent.

Menace
When this creature enters or transforms into The Witch-and-Sister, target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.
{1}{W}, {T}: Transform The Witch-and-Sister.
cards.rules_text2:
Lifelink
When this creature enters or transforms into The Sister-and-Witch, target creature you control gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
{1}{R}, {T}: Transform The Sister-and-Witch.

cards.rules_text: The Wolf Divided's power and toughness are each equal to 20 minus your life total.
cards.flavor_text: [i]When the Forge is cold, the Glory is dark, and the Wood is dust, perhaps the Wolf Divided will rest, but only until it can devour itself.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature can't be blocked.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you get a Scar. [i](It's a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)[/i]
Equip—Discard a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]There are keys that open doors; then there are keys that destroy them.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i]When a card becomes foretold its foretell cost is its mana cost if it doesn't have one. 
Lands can't have a cost and are played normally.[/i]

Foretelling cards from your hand costs {1} less.
Whenever you play a card from exile, Glassgarden Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The principle of Lantern shows us the light behind the world and illuminates the dark without mercy.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Dreamway Key deals combat damage to a player, untap up to one target creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The principle of Knock permits no seal and no isolation.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Counter target spell. You get a Scar. [i](It's a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The principle of Winter brings silence and endings.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Sensation Ascender dies, if an opponent lost life this turn, you draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The principle of Grail drowns us in pleasure, hunger, and carnal sensation.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
When Wood's Deceiver dies, mill three cards.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The principle of Moth sheds the old to embrace a chaotic true form.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The principle of Forge destroys the old and creates the new, and heralds the flames of invention, industry, and power.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains your choice of first strike or reach until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The principle of Edge conquers through war, cunning, and pain.[/i]

cards.rules_text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The principle of Secret Histories displays flaws in the mortal world and its multiple pasts.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
Thyrsine Tracker enters with a +1/+1 counter on it if you control a Sanctuary or God.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The principle of Heart beats eternally, its movements shall protect and preserve, but the Heart is just as dangerous.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Society Headquarters enters tapped.
When Society Headquarters enters, induct. [i](Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “Sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform this creature.” It transforms into a 4/4 God Horror creature token that can't block.)[/i]
{T}: Add {C}.
cards.flavor_text: [i]This is a place of worship. The words change, the gods change, but always, eventually, there is blood.[/i]

{4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

{4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

When Burgeoning Risen dies, induct. [i](Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “Sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform this creature.” It transforms into a 4/4 God Horror creature token that can't block.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Its bones are rotten wood, and soon it will take root, but until then it will be a swift and subtle servant.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace
When Mirrored Wolf enters, if target opponent controls no basic lands, put a +1/+1 counter on Mirrored Wolf.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The house of the Moon is empty and still, but it is home for those who wait for the sun to be whole again. [/i]

cards.rules_text: Tap a creature you control: Target creature can't block Noon Delver Serpent until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Monsters not of the Mansus dwell in the waters of Port Noon, away from the notice of the Hours.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Banisher Priest enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Monsters not willing to serve shall not be permitted in the Wake.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack, block, or be sacrificed.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I wish it could have been different. I wish that I could have done everything I should not.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Broken Sun-Servant enters, you get a Scar. [i](It's a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The death of the Sun-in-Splendour shattered both many laylines and many wings.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Choose up to two target permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The Ring-Yew brings renewal, your heartbeat is not allowed to cease.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less. Its controller may induct. [i](Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “Sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform this creature.” It transforms into a 4/4 God Horror creature token that can't block.)[/i]
Whenever Forge Secretkeeper attacks, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Smiths have whispered sacred words to the iron, spoken in ritual to inspire an unmerciful change.[/i]

cards.rules_text: {1}{W}: Discard Glass Guardian: Exile the top card of your library face down. It becomes foretold. [i](Its foretell cost is its mana cost if it isn't already specified.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]From its core a light from behind the world lies, leaking from its cracks.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Iron Verdict deals 5 damage to target tapped creature.
Foretell {W} [i](During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)[/i]

At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, exile target card in a graveyard, you may have it become foretold. [i](Their foretell costs are their mana costs if they aren't already specified.)[/i]

When Legacy of the Wheel enters, exile all the cards in your hand face down, then draw that many cards plus one.
When Legacy of the Wheel is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, shuffle your hand into your library, then return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.
Whenever an opponent loses life, you may return target creature card with mana value less than or equal to the life lost from your graveyard to your hand. Do this only once during each of your turns.
Whenever you exile one or more cards, if they became foretold, Legacy of Flint deals 2 damage to any target. Otherwise, up to one target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]In fire are all the treasures of the earth revealed.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. [i](It must survive the damage to get the counters.)[/i]
Whenever you attack, Legacy of Coils deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Fanged tentacle-necks wrestle like kittens. It tears cheerfully at its own flesh.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Subverted Cyprian enters, choose one—
• Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain 2 life.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Subverted Cyprian.

Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
As long as you control a God, you may cast Verse Illuminate from your graveyard. Then exile it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]We call upon the Sun-in-Rags, to bring about a glorious ending.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Until end of turn, target creature gains “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.”
As long as you control a God, you may cast Verse Open from your graveyard. Then exile it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]We call upon the Mother of Ants, which openeth.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Mill three cards, you may put a creature card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. 
As long as you control a God, you may cast Verse Change from your graveyard. Then exile it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]We call upon the Moth, who seeks among the trees of the Wood.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Destroy up to one target artifact. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
As long as you control a God, you may cast Verse Reshape from your graveyard. Then exile it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]We call upon the Forge of Days, who ends what will not change.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.
As long as you control a God, you may cast Verse Aggress from your graveyard. Then exile it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]We call upon the Lionsmith, who lives in eternal rivalry.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Until end of turn, target creature you control has base power and toughness 4/4 and gains flying, hexproof, and “When this creature dies, draw a card.” 
Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step unless you pay {2}.
cards.flavor_text: [i]When Worms take flesh, there is almost nothing to be done except destroy what remains.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+3 until end of turn. If you control a Sanctuary or God, that creature also gains hexproof until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]We are shrouded with the Ivory Dove's power, there is nothing that can be taken.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Nowhere Illuminator enters, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“If they complete their work the Mansus will be Nowhere one day”
— [/i]Etching from the Worm Museum[i][/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is a blue Reflection, gets -3/-0, loses all abilities, and can't be sacrificed.
cards.flavor_text: [i]This is the cell the Sun-in-Rags built, where the sea grows hard as horn and the sunset pale as mirrors.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. If this spell was cast from exile, create two of those tokens instead.
Foretell {2}{U}{U} [i](During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The Twins drowned at sea to ascend through the Painted River.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library if it's attacking or you control a God.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Across a bright far sea, Port Noon lies. Exiles, monsters and visionaries have long favored the waters around it.[/i]

cards.rules_text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if a creature you control dealt combat damage to a player this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Noon has always been a place outside of the rule of the hours, and many have other beings they would like to exclude as well.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Carapace Shearer dies, if it's not an Insect, return it to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter. It's an Insect in addition to its other types.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Humanity was said to be hatched from the shell of the Carapace Cross, but some merely clipped their wings.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
When Dry-Soul Angel enters, each player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The division of the Sun has empowered those that thrive near death.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Destroy target creature. If you controlled a God as you cast this spell, you gain 1 life. Otherwise, you lose 3 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]As was done to the Thunderskin in restitution for the slaying the Horned Axe's brothers and sisters, shall be done to you.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
When Herald of Loss enters, each opponent sends a foretold card to the graveyard or discards a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The sun has not always been this dim.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature dies, put an omen counter on The Museum of Worms.
Remove twice X omen counters from The Museum of Worms and sacrifice it: Create X 1/1 black Worm creature tokens with deathtouch and infect. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](That creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)[/i]

Enchant creature you don't control
When enchanted creature dies, put target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard onto the battlefield under your control, where X is 2 plus enchanted creature's mana value.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The Moth usurped the Wheel from within, hunting and stealing its skin.”
[/i]— On Lost Gods[i][/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn. Then, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to another target creature.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The Red Grail who cannot be sated drank the Tide and stole its pleasures for her own.”
— [/i]On Lost Gods[i][/i]

cards.rules_text:
Choose one —
• Exile the top card of your library.
• Exile target artifact.
Until the end of your next turn, you may play the exiled card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The Flint was shattered and the flames now follow the Forge.”[/i]
— On Lost Gods[i][/i]

cards.rules_text: Distribute X +1/+1 counters among creatures you control, where X is one plus the number of cards you've drawn this turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The fangs of the Seven-Coils were broken into the Blade and the Venom of the two new Gods from flesh.”
— [/i]On Lost Gods[i][/i]

cards.rules_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if an opponent lost life this turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A feast to honor the first sacrifice and the birth of the Moth and Grail.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile any number of permanents you control.
If you own 36 or more cards in exile you win the game. Otherwise, Rite Intercalate deals 6 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]This rite recapitulates the Sun's abominable fate. It is used in extreme times by foolish adepts.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Foul Alteration deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that permanent is token, Foul Alteration also deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
cards.flavor_text: [i]There are arts in Forge which may split even the sun.[/i]
[i]My companions return to me again and again, even though each time they are a little less.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Subvert the Light deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was cast from exile, it deals 4 damage instead.

cards.flavor_text: [i]Light becomes heat; Sun falls to the Forge.[/i]

Ward—Pay 1 life. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 1 life.)[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Reforging must first destroy, Edge dominates in destruction.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Unlucky Witness dies, exile the top two cards of your library. Until your next end step, you may play one of those cards.
cards.flavor_text: [i]When conducting occult operations, watchers are unwelcome.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A death in one history, an ascension in another. Scales arise from wounds.[/i]

Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains “Whenever this creature is dealt damage while its tapped, you get a Scar.” [i](It's a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The old gives way, the skin will shed, and not only once. [/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, enchanted creature becomes a God in addition to its other types, then sacrifice Ordeal of Defiance.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Defiance, you may have target creature you control fights another target creature.

When Ravenous Unmaker enters, you get a Scar. [i](It's a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever Ravenous Unmaker attacks or a boon you own triggers, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

When Dappled Wing-Clippers enters, mill two cards.
{2}{G}{G}, Sacrifice Dappled Wing-Clippers: Choose one —
• Return up to two land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
• Destroy up to two target artifacts or enchantments.
Search your library for a creature card with the same total power and toughness as target creature an opponent controls, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Wherever my foe goes, I will follow. I'd like him to die, even if I go down too.[/i]

Creatures with power less than Splinter-Blossom's power can't block it.
Whenever Splinter-Blossom is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. [i](It must survive the damage to get the counters.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Wolves are not always symbols of agony.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]I could cut a lock of hair before I sleep, to honour a power of the Wood. In my dreams, I listened to the dead as they approached the white bone gate.[/i]
